name: Community Shelter Board 24/7 Shelter Hotline for Families and Single adults
services: For families and single adults: call the 24/7 hotline to find emergency shelter housing in Franklin County

name: Victims of Domestic Violence 24/7 Hotline
services: For victims of domestic violence: call the 24/7 domestic violence crisis hotline to connect to professionals, find shelter, and additional services

name: Huckleberry House 24/7 Teen Crisis Shelter Hotline
services: For at-risk youth: call the 24/7 Huckleberry House teen crisis hotline to access shelter and housing resources

name: Mt. Carmel Housing Outreach Hotline
services: Call this number to get connected to shelters, housing, benefits and rent assistance, personalized healthcare resources, connect to employment resources, warming and cooling stations, and other support. This line is answered by a Mount Carmel team member. When appropriate, Mount Carmel will link people with the Southeast PATH team. Otherwise, Mount Carmel will begin engaging clients and working on access to needed care, determining a housing plan, and gathering documentation for housing.

address: 1220 Corrugate Way, Columbus, OH, United States

name: Huckleberry House
services: Helps Central Ohio youth ages 12-24 who are dealing with issues like family conflict, violence, poverty, and homelessness through providing crisis shelter housing, counseling, educational, employment, and housing support. Call (614) 294-5553 to reach our 24/7 crisis hotline.
address: 1421 Hamlet Street, Columbus, OH, United States

name: Youth Outreach Program at YOP Shop
